Minneapolis.Quatrefoil Library: Quatrefoil Library is a member-supported, non-profit 501 (c)(3) library for the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender community. The library was founded by David Irwin and Dick Hewetson in 1983, becoming the second LGBT lending library in the nation. In the beginning, it was not only an educational resource center but also a safe space for the LGBT community in Minneapolis.
